resourceTemplates.name: video-retrieve
resourceTemplates.title: Retrieve generated video
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves the generated video metadata and video file URL for a given generation ID. Returns the video URL, status, and any error messages.

resourceTemplates.name: pixverse-video-retrieve
resourceTemplates.title: Retrieve generated PixVerse video
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieves the generated PixVerse video metadata and PixVerse video file URL for a given generation ID. Returns the video URL, status, and any error messages.
